item.title: Why Did Sprouts Farmers Market’s Stock Crash 27% On Thursday?
item.description: Sprouts Farmers Market’s third-quarter revenue came in at $2.2 billion, just below street estimates

item.title: Why Is Retail Going Gaga Over INTS Stocks Today?
item.description: The firm announced positive data from a study of INT230-6 in the treatment of metastatic and refractory cancers, with 15 of 64 patients in the trial s...

item.title: Eli Lilly CEO Dave Ricks Reportedly Says Company Eyeing Pain Relief Market With Weight Loss Drug Retatrutide
item.description: CEO Dave Ricks told CNBC that the first study the company plans to read out for Retatrutide will be on knee pain.

item.title: Fox Stock Rallies On $1.5B Share Repurchase Plan, Q1 Beat
item.description: Fox’s proposed accelerated share repurchase program, starting October 31, will cover both Class A and Class B shares.

item.title: NVDA Stock Declines After Trump Says He Did Not Discuss Blackwell Chips With China’s Xi: Report
item.description: According to a CNBC report, President Trump told reporters that China would be talking to Nvidia and other chipmakers.
